name: Fireflies.ai Free
summary_and_recommendation: Fireflies.ai Free presents moderate risk primarily due to lack of enterprise admin controls and extended data retention. The tool does not use data for training and provides good encryption, but the free plan lacks organizational oversight capabilities. Recommend upgrading to Business or Enterprise plan for organizational use, or implement additional monitoring controls if using the free version.
assessment_notes: Assessment based on publicly available documentation. Good transparency from vendor with detailed security documentation and blog posts. Some enterprise features only available on paid plans.

recommended_restrictions: Block network access to sensitive systems

recommendations.title: Upgrade to Business/Enterprise plan for organizational use
recommendations.description: Free plan lacks admin controls, audit logs, and organizational oversight required for enterprise use

recommendations.title: Implement meeting consent protocols
recommendations.description: Establish clear policies for when Fireflies bot can join meetings and obtain explicit consent

recommendations.title: Regular data cleanup
recommendations.description: Since data is retained for 12+ months, implement regular review and deletion of old transcripts

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Fireflies.ai Free presents moderate risk primarily due to lack of enterprise admin controls and extended data retention. The tool does not use data for training and provides good encryption, but the free plan lacks organizational oversight capabilities. Recommend upgrading to Business or Enterprise plan for organizational use, or implement additional monitoring controls if using the free version.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - Data stored in US cloud infrastructure by default with enterprise options for preferred location storage on paid plans.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit + vendor-managed keys + published encryption specifications - Uses 256-bit AES encryption for meeting notes and transcripts at rest, and TLS encryption for data in transit.

data_retention.justification: Very Long Retention - Retention >1 year + limited deletion options + unclear retention procedures - Data is saved for at least 12 months with user control over individual meeting deletion but no automatic deletion procedures.

model_training.justification: Contractual guarantee of no training use - Fireflies has a 0-day data retention policy with all vendors with access to user content, ensuring none of your data is used for training AI models.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - Clear policy that user data is not shared with third parties for training purposes and has contractual guarantees with processing vendors.

admin_management.justification: No Admin Oversight - Individual accounts only + no organizational visibility + no centralized management - Free plan does not include admin controls, Super Admin, or organizational management features.

audit_capabilities.justification: No Audit Capabilities - No activity logs OR logs not accessible to administrators OR no usage tracking - Free plan does not include audit logs or usage tracking capabilities.

integration.justification: No Enterprise Integration - Username/password only + no SSO + no enterprise identity management - Free plan does not include SSO, SCIM provisioning, or enterprise integrations.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - Basic compliance certifications + privacy policy compliant with major regulations + some gaps in specialized requirements - SOC 2 Type II and GDPR compliant, but HIPAA compliance only available on Enterprise plan.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Basic Transparency - General data processing description + retention periods stated + some third-party relationships disclosed - Clear documentation of data processing, retention policies, and third-party relationships.

documentation_and_support.justification: Good Documentation - Clear privacy policy + basic security documentation + responsive support + annual transparency reports - Comprehensive security documentation, detailed blog posts, and clear privacy policies available.
